channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4160] No phone numbers will be transfered to SAP
item.description:
Please define the transformation of the

Phone Number
Mobile Number
Fax Number

during registration from Hybris to SAP.
item.summary: No phone numbers will be transfered to SAP

comments.comment: And shipping created by the SAP is also not updated in the web shop.
Also: The Country-preface of the phone-numbers(for example: +370) should not be sent to SAP.

• Phone, Fax and Mobile number has been transfered for B2C customer
    --> But including the +37 --> This should not be transfered to SAP.
  • Phone, Fax and Mobile has not been transfered for B2B customer

The phone numbers in the B2BUnit address were not persisted by hybris during the registration form.
They were persisted only in MOVEX case. (DISTRELEC-3991 and DISTRELEC-3915)

Now the problem is fixed.
We always persist the phone numbers if the customer has entered them.

Also upon registration those do not get transmitted to SAP.
Mobile + Phone not updated in myaccount when changed in SAP for B2C customers. For the Fax number it works.
FYI: For B2B-Customers on Q-System the Mobilphone is stil not updated in myaccount under login-data section.

Phone Number Code +37 is still available in SAP.

  • User: distrelec.testing+lt5_1@gmail.com
  • Mobile still missing.

Francesco,
please "resolve" again when it is fixed (and add the next fix version to the existin gone).
Thanks
FYI: the right country code is actually +370.

Current status:

  • mobile number still not transferred to SAP
  • Validation with Evangelos needed about sending of prefix
Francesco, please fix the mobile number error and then assign to Evangelos for clarification regarding prefix.
fixed

There is still an issue with the normal telephone-number(read&update). After registration you'll get mobile-phone-number in MyAccount. If you change then the displayed value, the normal telephone number is displayed again. Please see attached PDF.
Fixed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3793] Hybris hmc -> DB character-limit Webtrekk-parameter
item.description:
For the Webtrekk-parameter 'WT Activate Event Tracking:' there is currently a DB limit of 255 characters (compare attached screenshot). This limit shall be increased to a limit of 1000 characters.

Thx Mark

comments.comment: Since Laurent has fixed DISTRELEC-4081. This is also fixed by that. When the merge will take place from brunch to trunk this will be also fixed on the trunk as well.
On Q for testing.

Issue still resides. Test-procedure:

  • http://q-hybris.datwyler.biz/
  • Account: mark.diggelmann
  • Website -> distrelec_LTContentCatalog
  • Webtrekk Properties
  • Field 'WT Activate Event Tracking'

Issue is remaining. Compare above and verify please.

Thx Mark
See Mark's comment.
With oracle we can not change the column type if we have data in the column. I have a solution but I will ask Raphael before.
Please clarify, thanks.

During the deployment and before the system update, we have to clean the CMS site table (wtActivateEventTracking attribute) with an impex (see release note 2.0.7).
After the system update, we will play impexes to fill again this attribute :

  • HP-Q : /environment/common/hybris/bin/custom/distrelecB2Binitialdata/resources/distrelecB2Binitialdata/import/project/contentCatalogs/distrelec_XXContentCatalog/webtrekk.impex
  • HP-P : /environment/env-hp-p-app-common/hybris/bin/custom/distrelecB2Binitialdata/resources/distrelecB2Binitialdata/import/project/contentCatalogs/distrelec_XXContentCatalog/webtrekk.impex

Hello

We have found an easier solution. The column will be a varchar2 with a length of 2000.
Mark, is it enough for you? If yes, I can do it now on HP-Q.

Regards,

Laurent

Hi Laurent

Of course that's fine. I assume that varchar2 can handle any common characters/figures.

Thx Mark
Yes
2.0.7 -> verified on Q. Looks good - Thanks!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4323] Direct Order Suggest Layer: Prices not showing
item.description:
In the direct order suggest layer, currently on the Q system the prices are not showing. Sometimes also the article number are not showing.

  • CH Chrome, Safari: prices and article number not showing
  • CH Firefox: article number showing, price not showing
  • AT, IT, LT Chrome Safari Firefox: article number showing, price not showing.

Is this an FE problem, or is the information not passed along from the FactFinder on the Q system?
item.summary: Direct Order Suggest Layer: Prices not showing

comments.comment: Raphael, might this be an FF problem and possibly only occur on Q?

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4283] Discounted itemes on the LT shop
item.description:
Customer ordered 10-539-72, which is discountined. And got info: ... At this moment you can not order this item
He called us with claim.
Is it possible to show more exact information for discountinued items like—Item discountinued and can not bo ordered any more
item.summary: Discounted itemes on the LT shop

comments.comment:
The item has a sales organization and is punched out for CH.
Could you please check why it is not buyable in LT?

The product has the sales status 30 what means active. But if you try to add this product to the basket, than SAP returns that this product has status "UTG discontinued".
Now the problem is, that as we are not able to import the sales status at the moment, the SAP status has maybe changed and we still have the old status. When we are able to import the status we have to check that again. If the status is still 30 in the file, than probably SAP is sending the wrong codes or the mapping in PI is wrong.

---------------------------
ID: 21828
Address: http://pipdisap.dat.datwyler.biz:52000/XISOAPAdapter/MessageServlet?senderParty=&senderService=WSP&receiverParty=&receiverService=&interface=SI_Hybris_v1_out&interfaceNamespace=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.distrelec.com%2Fhybris
Encoding: UTF-8
Content-Type: text/xml
Headers:

{Accept=[*/*], Authorization=[Basic Q09NX1dTMlBJOklQMlNXX01PQw==], SOAPAction=["http://sap.com/xi/WebService/soap1.1"]}

Payload: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"><soap:Body><ns2:OrderCalculationRequest xmlns:ns2="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris"><salesOrganization>7710</salesOrganization><simulateOrder>true</simulateOrder><orderEntries><materialNumber>11053972</materialNumber><quantity>1</quantity><freeGiftPromotion>false</freeGiftPromotion></orderEntries><freeShippingPromotion>false</freeShippingPromotion><editableByAllContacts>false</editableByAllContacts></ns2:OrderCalculationRequest></soap:Body></soap:Envelope>
--------------------------------------

----------------------------
ID: 21828
Response-Code: 500
Encoding: UTF-8
Content-Type: text/xml; charset=utf-8
Headers:

{content-id=[<soap-B5819153ECB44858E1000000C6120077@sap.com>], Content-Length=[505], content-type=[text/xml; charset=utf-8], date=[Fri, 06 Jun 2014 13:01:59 GMT], server=[SAP NetWeaver Application Server 7.20 / AS Java 7.31], set-cookie=[JSESSIONMARKID=ypHoTQx-ObNksUkRXLHw1qn-NWEpga1ae78tqICQw; Version=1; Path=/, JSESSIONID=-2qk7uF5lEcvijvH1j4-sElhgUVxRgHaiAkM_SAPZPz62QY1EOmoM4ACuj7zSphD; Version=1; Path=/, saplb_*=(pipdisap_PIP_20)201951450; Version=1; Path=/]}

Payload: <SOAP:Envelope xmlns:SOAP='http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/'><SOAP:Header/><SOAP:Body><SOAP:Fault><faultcode>SOAP:Server</faultcode><faultstring>Server Error</faultstring><detail><ns1:FaultMessage xmlns:ns1='http://www.distrelec.com/hybris'><faultId>NOTMAPPED</faultId><faultName>Mapping in SAP table :ZDGTT_HYBRISERR is missing</faultName><faultText>SAP ERR:V1,028 :Material 10-539-72 has status: UTG discontinued</faultText></ns1:FaultMessage></detail></SOAP:Fault></SOAP:Body></SOAP:Envelope>
--------------------------------------
06 Jun 2014 15:01:59 ERROR [hybrisHTTP4911] [10.191.16.12] [SapOrderCalculationService] SOAP error while calling method 'if11OrderCalculation' on SAP PI interface: faultstring = 'Server Error', faultText = 'SAP ERR:V1,028 :Material 10-539-72 has status: UTG discontinued'.
06 Jun 2014 15:01:59 WARN [hybrisHTTP4911] [10.191.16.12] [AddToCartController] Couldn't add product of code 11053972 to cart.
Sales status was not up-to-date in hybris. Now the product has switched to status 60 (EOL).

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4274] Logfile internal seems not to be working
item.description:
Internal log function seems not to be working properly as I get an error message (logfile missing) when doing an analysis.

When looking at the normal analysis, the search terms indicate that we still log internal searches, too.
item.summary: Logfile internal seems not to be working

comments.comment:
Well as you can see the logging is working, because otherwise you will not see the new options (asn.internal/internal).
The error is maby there because you did not made any internal searches in this time frame.

An URL for internal use should look like this:
http://www.distrelec.ch/search?q=usb&log=internal

The only bug I have found was, that we just have logged internal searches for the search but not for the categories.
This gets fixed with the next release.
seems not to be fixed. Still the same behaviour of the logfile analysis and the internal searches are still appearing in my analysis of the initial search. In all the channels.
This is fixed for v2.0.7. This is not yet deployed on P! So you have to check that after the P deployment which is planned for next Tuesday.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4239] Coordinate correction in Stock Interface Movex - Elfa SAP
item.summary: Coordinate correction in Stock Interface Movex - Elfa SAP

comments.comment: Impacts the other Elfa countries as well at the moment.
As i talked with Florian Bühler, this is a Web Shop issue. It would be finished in the 24th week.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4081] Rollout // Webtrekk
item.description:
Country Domain TrackID's (Live)

ID's:
Elfa Denmark distrelec.dk 833315641680165,580777942866624
Elfa Lithuania distrelec.lt 344846453175275,580777942866624
Elfa Norway distrelec.no 159691802202230,580777942866624
Elfa Sweden distrelec.se 335639864446470,580777942866624

Für den Go-Live von LT bitte Folgendes beachten:

  • Zentrales 'Basis' WT_JS_File: Bitte mit dem angehängten File ersetzen.
  • Initial-Routine für LT Go-Live: Vgl. dazu das angehängte File 'distrelec.lt_initial-WT-Properties_MDI_v1.0_14-04-29.txt'. Bitte berücksichtigen, d.h. die Parameter mit den angegebenen Werten ab Go-Live bitte übernehmen (wurde bis dato durch Namics [Lukas, Dishan] vorgenommen - hat bis dato geklappt). Falls benötigt, findest du dazu weitere Infos im angehängten E-Mail. Ansonsten bitte bei mir rückfragen.

comments.comment:
Hoi Mark,
Wir würde also vorerst noch die Test-ID's verwenden, bis zum endgültigen Livegang. So sollten wir keine Probleme haben, richtig?
Gruss, Rafael

Basically the following shall apply:

  • test.distrelec.[tld] and prod.distrelec.[tld].distrelec.com: Use/Implement the Test Webtrekk Tracking-ID (’426030204200466’)
  • distrelec.[tld] (ex Go-Live): Setting of the Webtrekk parameter-values (by initial-routine) according to the attached .txt-file

In addition the centrally stored webtrekk_v3.js-file shall be replaced by the file contained in the attached webtrekk_v3.zip (if possible this could be done asap or if not feasible upon the next deployment -> this shall apply for all pre-existing Hybris country-catalogues)

Thx Mark

Tracking code for LT production test changed to "426030204200466" (test tracking code).
Has to be replaced when really go live with original code "344846453175275,580777942866624"

Tracking ID for live system has been implemented.
Keep ticket open to update the JS file of Webtrekk

In addition please compare the attached file 'distrelec.lt_initial-WT-Properties_MDI_v1.0_14-04-29.txt'. The following Webtrekk parameters and according values were not implemented so far (by initial routine) upon LT P-deployment:

GENERAL PROPERTIES

  • activatedEvents: 'add_products', 'add-cdo', 'acc-att', 'req-hbr', 'add-nsl', 'add-ltc', 'blk-afl', 'blk-acl', 'blk-asl', 'add-ltc', 'blk-rsl', 'cart', 'download', 'list', 'cart', 'compare', 'favorite', 'list', 'print', 'share', 'nlt-nlt', 'nlt-snd', 'sup-sup', 'sup-snd', 'fdk-fdk', 'fdk-snd', 'srh-snd', 'spa-spa', 'spa-snd', 'req-hbr', 'req-snd'

--> customParameter

  • wt.linkTrackDownloads: eps;exe;jpg;doc;docx;pdf;ppt;pptx;pps;ppsx;psd;txt;htm;html;xhtml;rtf;tif;wmv;mpg;flv;mp4;xls;xlsx;xml;zip;rar;gz

DEDICATED PROPERTIES

--> Homepage (all languages):

  • heatmap: (window.opera)?"0":"1"

Es wäre super, wenn dies bis anfangs nächster Woche umgesetzt werden könnte. Idealerweise gleichzeitig mit DISTRELEC-3568. Für den Switch auf die neue Optivo <-> Webtrekk Schnittstelle wären wir darauf angewiesen.

Danke! Mark
Kurze Rückfrage: Wird dies anfangs dieser Woche möglich sein?
Florian, please assign to a developer
Could you please take care of this?
New value for wtActivateEventTrackingDefault and heatmap for the homepage.
Hi Mark, please test. Thanks.

Ciao Rafi

Kann ich nicht testen auf Q, da dies ausschliesslich für LT LIVE vorgesehen ist.
-> FYI: Die eigentlich 'Gesamtbereinigung' der WT .js-files ist im Ticket DISTRELEC-3568 abgehandelt.

Given 2.0.7 everything looks fine on Q. Let's push it to P - I do hope that is works out fine (script & pre-configs).

Thx Mark
please test when live.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3830] Different drop shippment stock for ITA
item.description:
The stock of drop shippment items for Italy should be different to Switzerland/Austria.
For that reason we need a specific ITA-stock import for local drop shippment "Streckenartikel" products.

We only will get this file (erp_stock-D3P273)once a day.
item.summary: Different drop shippment stock for ITA

comments.comment: Define Warehouse with Raphael Leu.

The Warehouses should be named:
-EFIT
-ESIT
Further clarification needed, Florian will update with results and next steps, if needed.

Please implement as discussed.
Priorization Logic.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3568] 1 -> 2 'Basic' Webtrekk-Files / Initial Webtrekk-routine
item.description:
-> CR

The following requirements have been pre-discussed with Dishan via e-mail and phone:

-> Current configuration: webtrekk_test_v3.js is imported into a Catalogue (on Stage and Prod) in case of a new Catalogue or a deployment. In both environments the Js-file is referenced as following: [[...]]/webtrekk_test_v3.js (e.g. http://www.distrelec.ch/medias/sys_master/h31/hd4/8840822685726/webtrekk_test_v3.js)

-> Required configuration (in case of a new Catalogue or a deployment):

  • Stage: webtrekk_test_v3.js (please use attached file) | Standard initial-routine: According to attached file (Stage-environment_initial-WT-Properties_MDI_v1.0_14-04-22.txt) | Js-referencing: [[...]]/webtrekk_test_v3.js
  • Prod: webtrekk_v3.js (please use attached file) | Standard initial-routine: To be provided before each Go-Live by Distrelec | Js-referencing: [[...]]/webtrekk_v3.js

Thx Mark

comments.comment:
Hi Mark,

I have used webtrekk_test_v3.js file for both development / test env.
While webtrekk_v3.js file is being used by the production env.

If that is correct then, then changes are ready to test.

Hi Neeraj

That's correct:

  • webtrekk_test_v3.js file: DEV / STAGE / PROD (e.g. prod.distrelec.lt.distrelec.com)
  • webtrekk_v3.js: LIVE

Please also consider the required pre-configurations (value-settings) for any DEV-, STAGE- or PROD-deployments (according to the attached 'Stage-environment_initial-WT-Properties_MDI_v1.0_14-06-04.txt'-file). Is that implemented as well?
Please note that Laurent implemented this accordingly for the LIVE-environment.

Thx Mark

...in addition: As 2.0.6 is now deployed I have shortly tested on test.distrelec.lt. It seems that webtrekk_v3.gz is implemented instead of webtrekk_test_v3.gz. Please verify (also for .ch, .at, .it -> there are complete different scripts implemented)!

Thx Mark
@Neeraj: I can not see that we make a difference between Q and P. Do we really have implemented that correct? If you need any help here, just ask me.

Hi Raphael,

They Way I fix it like I added one more row under table called media which has attribute called "WT_JS_FILE_TEST". You can check that on "webtrekk.impex" file.

And under Environment extension for each environment common folder i modified local.properties file this attribute webtrekk.javascript.media=WT_JS_FILE_TEST

So don't know why it is not picking up the right file.

@Raphael:- Is any thing else also need to be done ?
Hoi Raphi, Could you please answer the question from Neeraj. Thanks.

Hi Neeraj

Have you checked in that to trunk or to the branch v2.0?
If you made the change in the trunk, than you are on the wrong channel! See my mail about switching to the branch v2.0 for bugfixing!
Because I can not see this change.

Hi Raphael,

Yes you are right I checked this into trunk as I see this card as a Feature Request not a bug.

I will switch to the v2.0 and will apply the fix over there.

Thanks

Hi Raphael,

as we discuss on the lync , I checked all the files on the branch v2.0.

This include changes in impex file, local.properies files under each environment & common. Also uploded the new js file in a gz compressed format.

Now I am assigning this to Laurent as we disscuss so that he can check the right webtrekk setting as described in the attached .txt file.

Thanks

Hi

It's ok.

HP-P configuration : /environment/env-hp-p-app-common/hybris/bin/custom/distrelecB2Binitialdata/resources/distrelecB2Binitialdata/import/project/contentCatalogs/distrelec_XXContentCatalog/webtrekk.impex
Others environements : /environment/common/hybris/bin/custom/distrelecB2Binitialdata/resources/distrelecB2Binitialdata/import/project/contentCatalogs/distrelec_XXContentCatalog/webtrekk.impex

This impexes will be played during the deployment (already in the release note)

2.0.7 -> Script looks good. Pre-configs more or less also.

What is missing so far:

  • domain: 'REGEXP:^test\.distrelec\...$'
  • wt.linkTrackDownloads: eps;exe;jpg;doc;docx;pdf;ppt;pptx;pps;ppsx;psd;txt;htm;html;xhtml;rtf;tif;wmv;mpg;flv;mp4;xls;xlsx;xml;zip;rar;gz

Let's leave that and go LIVE - I do hope that is works out fine (script & pre-configs).

Thx Mark
